name: Ch20BBaseConvo2
_source: music;22- Twisted Shadows A Orchestral Cover
speak;Knoll;Excuse me, Lady Myrrh.|I hope I'm not disturbing you.
speak;Knoll;I've been researching the ancient magical sites of Magvel.|The <red>Darkling Woods</> are of particular interest.
speak;Knoll;It's said that the woods contain magical energy unlike anywhere else.|As someone who lived there, perhaps you could share some insights?
speak;Myrrh;I...|I don't know much about that.
speak;Knoll;Even the smallest detail would be invaluable.|Our records in Grado are woefully incomplete on the subject.
speak;Knoll;There are mentions of ancient relics within the heart of the woods.|Were you familiar with such artifacts?
speak;Knoll;I understand this might be difficult.|The fall of Grado has shown how dangerous forgotten knowledge can be.|But perhaps with proper understanding, we could prevent such tragedies.
speak;Knoll;I see...|Something about this topic troubles you greatly.
speak;Knoll;My apologies, Lady Myrrh.|I didn't intend to cause you distress.|The pursuit of knowledge should never come at such a cost.
speak;Knoll;No, I can see that it isn't.|Some secrets are kept for good reason.|I of all people should understand that.
speak;Knoll;Please forgive my intrusion.|I'll continue my research through other means.
speak;Knoll;Of course.|We all have painful memories in these dark times.|I'll leave you in peace now.
speak;Myrrh;The woods are...|No one should go there now.
